page.prototype: .CreateCNAMEEntry as L (From as C, To as C)

argument.name: From
argument.description: The DNS name from which to map.

argument.name: To
argument.description: The value to map to (substitute for) the DNS name provided.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .t. if the call succeeded or .f. if the function call failed. See the contents of the CallResult property for more information on the cause of the error.
